mapper.select: select rownum, b.* from (select * from board_tb b order by b_dtt desc) b where cat_cd = 0 and rownum < 6
select count(*) from board_tb where cat_cd = #{cat_cd}

select * from (select row_number() over (order by B_DTT desc) ronum, cat_cd, b_dtt, b_title, b_content, u_id from board_tb where U_ID like '%' || #{keyWord} || '%') where ronum between #{rowStart} and #{rowEnd} and cat_cd = #{cat_cd} order by B_DTT desc
mapper.insert: insert into board_tb(CAT_CD, b_dtt, B_TITLE, B_CONTENT, U_ID) values(#{cat_cd}, systimestamp , #{b_title}, #{b_content}, #{u_id})
mapper.update: update board_tb set b_visite = b_visite + 1 where b_dtt = #{b_dtt}
